properties.entry: INSERT INTO TB_EVENT_BOARD ( EVENT_NO, EVENT_TITLE, EVENT_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, STATUS, MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_EVENT_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, SYSDATE, DEFAULT, ? )

INSERT INTO TB_EVENT_PHOTO ( EVENT_PHOTO_NO, EVENT_PHOTO_ORIGINNAME, EVENT_PHOTO_CHANGENAME, EVENT_PHOTO_ADDRESS, EVENT_NO, STATUS, FILELEVEL ) VALUES ( SEQ_EVENT_PHOTO_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, SEQ_EVENT_BOARD_NO.CURRVAL, DEFAULT, ? )

SELECT * FROM (SELECT EB.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT TB_EVENT_BOARD.EVENT_NO, EVENT_TITLE, COUNT, EVENT_PHOTO_ADDRESS || '/' || EVENT_PHOTO_CHANGENAME "TITLE_IMG" FROM TB_EVENT_BOARD JOIN TB_EVENT_PHOTO ON (TB_EVENT_BOARD.EVENT_NO = TB_EVENT_PHOTO.EVENT_NO) WHERE TB_EVENT_BOARD.STATUS = 'Y' AND TB_EVENT_PHOTO.FILELEVEL = 1 ORDER BY TB_EVENT_BOARD.EVENT_NO DESC)EB) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE TB_EVENT_BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE EVENT_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT EVENT_NO, EVENT_TITLE, EVENT_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MEMBER_NAME, STATUS, COUNT FROM TB_EVENT_BOARD JOIN TB_MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE EVENT_NO = ? AND TB_EVENT_BOARD.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT EVENT_PHOTO_NO, EVENT_PHOTO_ORIGINNAME, EVENT_PHOTO_CHANGENAME, EVENT_PHOTO_ADDRESS, EVENT_NO, STATUS, FILELEVEL FROM TB_EVENT_PHOTO WHERE EVENT_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY FILELEVEL ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_EVENT_BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE TB_EVENT_BOARD SET STATUS = 'N', COUNT = 0 WHERE EVENT_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_EVENT_PHOTO SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE EVENT_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_EVENT_BOARD SET EVENT_TITLE = ?, EVENT_CONTENT = ? WHERE EVENT_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE TB_EVENT_PHOTO SET EVENT_PHOTO_ORIGINNAME = ?, EVENT_PHOTO_CHANGENAME = ? WHERE PHOTO_NO = ? AND EVENT_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
